Articles.Content: So I've noticed, in the SPH and the VAB it is always sunny, despite it being night time in kerbal time. I would love to see this change in a newer update, it's rather small and probably petty but it would be cool nonetheless!

This freaks me out every time. Would support. Plus, night-time hangar shots of spaceplanes almost always look awesome.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-02T20:08:21Z" title="07/02/2015 08:08  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 2, 2015</time> by Kagame**
  
HEIL SPELLING!

This is frequently suggested and nothing has happened, so I would keep my hopes for something official - low.

 [Developer comment from last year](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100570-Devnote-Tuesdays-The-Already-Lining-up-for-Black-Friday-Edition?p=1550616). 

In the meantime, [this Mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113833) might make you happy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Also, you can see clouds from the inside view, even witouth EVE.
